data.fullContent: Mr. Smith's office was very small. It had a big window, but not a lot of light came through because it was dirty. His bookshelves were full of books and files, and his desk was messy. There was a pretty rug on the floor, but it was covered in dirt.
data.answer: 史密斯先生的办公室很小。它有一扇很大的窗户，但是没有多少光线射进来，因为它很脏。他的书架上堆满了书和文件，他的桌子也很乱。地板上有一块很漂亮的地毯，但上面全是泥土。
